pageProduct.name: Sukin Coffee And Coconut Exfoliating Masque 100ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Rise and shine with our 2-in-1 Exfoliating Coffee & Coconut Masque! This cream based masque is perfect for a normal to dryer skin type, with Vitamin E it works to replenish the skins moisture levels. A blend of Aloe Vera, Coconut Shell and locally sourced coffee beans (from the Coffee Cart that visits Sukin HQ in Melbourne) is added to exfoliate the skin when removing, to leave it feeling energised, polished and silky smooth!
TIP: Follow with a facial oil or serum, as your skin will soak up all of the goodness after being masked!

Common Uses

Coffee Scrub Masque
Wake Up Your Skin With A Combination Of Locally Sourced Ground Coffee Beans, Aloe Vera & Coconut Shell.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Powder, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Jojoba Esters, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Shell Powder, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Coco-Caprylate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Lactic Acid, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol. *Natural Fragrance

Directions

Apply to damp face and neck. Relax and allow to penetrate for 15 minutes and then gently rub off in a circular motion to exfoliate skin. Wash off with warm water and wash cloth
